description:
It was discovered that Apache Groovy incorrectly handled
 serialization mechanisms. An attacker could possibly use this issue
to execute arbitrary code.

groovy2.description: Agile dynamic language for the Java Virtual Machine

title: Apache Groovy vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Apache Groovy could be made to run programs as your login if
received a specially crafted serialized object.
